body:
From the little understanding I got of Jap, they'd agreed to meet and fuck(?), and once it was over the dude simply asked if they could exchange contacts, to which she answered by burning him alive. And from what I could understand, it wasn't the first time (?).

RIP Dude tho, at least you got to fuck the loli v.v
The guy asked for the translation version, thats why he diededod
